name: Shifting Roads
description:
A road twisting puzzle game! Get your brain working with 10 scenarios with randomly generated tiles, create the path to the goal, and try and beat your personal best!

Your high score is saved, best with the least moves, and best with the fastest time!

Controls are quiet simple! Click any adjacent piece to the empty square to slide the piece over, once the path is built, click go and watch your car drive to victory (or not!)
